means: （德国歌剧家、作曲家）瓦格纳作风的
作曲家瓦格纳的崇拜者（门徒）

sentence.Network_en: Nowhere is this more true than with Wagnerian opera.
sentence.Network_cn: 以瓦格纳的歌剧来说明这一点最恰当不过.
瓦格纳的歌剧给人以回肠荡气的享受.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to Richard Wagner or his music

auth_sentence.content: A strategic predicament of positively Wagnerian proportions.

auth_sentence.content: It might bring him into a Brucknerian or even Wagnerian realm.
